name: Unsewn
description:
You tried to be a good person, really. Problem is, it isn't easy. You find yourself in Limbo, where you'll take care of the fabric of reality, but there's a problem: the machines in limbo have gone hostile and you have to unravel the puzzles and reset the Die of Fate!

Features: Puzzle-based platforming and insane characters. Open-ended hub style level design.

Controls:

Jump - Spacebar/A

Fan Tool (once unlocked) - Left Mouse/X

Glide (once unlocked) - Spacebar/A while in the air

Interact - E/B

IMPORTANT BEFORE PLAYING:

If you find yourself unable to reach a jump or interact with something, look around, there might be a tool nearby to help you.

Voice Acting:

The Raven, Voice from Above - Jacob Reynolds

Assorted trapped souls - Nick Reynolds
